# Security Policy

## Supported Versions

Currently only the latest stream is supported.

| Version | Supported          |
| ------- | ------------------ |
|  1.2.x  | :white_check_mark: |
|  < 1.2  | :x:                |

## Reporting a Vulnerability

Please open an issue describing the problem.

## Preferred Languages

We prefer all communications to be in **English**.
